title: Did Trump Defense Secretary ‘Disarm’ DC National Guard Before Insurrection?
subtitle: The claim stemmed from a Jan. 4 memo authored by former acting Defense Security Christopher Miller.
author: Jessica Lee
vclaim: On Jan. 4, 2021, two days before Trump supporters rioted in the U.S. Capitol, former acting Defense Secretary Christopher Miller issued a memo that "disarmed" D.C. National Guard.
